Die Veranstaltung "EARS - Education & Applied Soundscape Research" ist alleiniger
    Bestandteil des seit dem SoSe 2024 angebotenen, gleichnamigen Moduls
    "EARS - Education & Applied Soundscape Research" (6 LP).
This module can be conducted in German and/or English.
The module as an integrated course covers mainly two parts:
1) Theoretical part - Introduction to the soundscape concept, urban noise protection, noise mapping, transportation planning and urban and regional planning.
2) Practical part - Group work in selected projects (noise mapping, citizen participation, soundwalk, acoustic measurements, design proposals)
--> Registration for exam necessary via MTS until June 9.
